title: One Stubborn Cowboy
description: Kelly Evans’ first encounter with bossy, opinionated, know-it-all cowboy Kit Lockford really rankles. She’s sure all Mr. Bossy needs is some retraining–and she just might be the one for the job.Despite his vow to stay away from entanglements, Kit can’t resist the sweetest woman he’s ever met. He tries to push her away with bad behavior, but she’s sure there’s a better man inside him. Can there be something to what she says about his disability—that it’s a part of him and doesn’t need to be a barrier between them?If you enjoy stories about opposites finding their way to love, this sweet cowboy romance will have you rooting for their happy ever after. Get your copy today!
author: Barbara McMahon
